entry.title: Hexo安装Next 6.6 主题
entry.content: 安装并应用Next主题blog目录下运行：git clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next themes/next 更改网站配置文件：个性化主题更改主题样式(主题配置文件)scheme: Pisces 更改头像(主题配置文件)Sidebar Avatar avatar: url: /gif/avatar1.gif 增加搜索功能命令行运行：npm install hexo-generator-searchdb --save 网站配置文件添加：search: path: search.xml field: post format: html limit: 10000 主题配置文件修改：local_search: enable: true 开启动态背景(主题配置文件内置了几种特效，需要开启的特性改为 true)# Canvas-nest # Dependencies: https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-canvas-nest canvas_nest: enable: true 同时需要安装相应的特效代码(查看官方网站的readme文档)博客目录下运行：git clone https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-canvas-nest source/lib/canvas-nest 其它特效开启方式也是如此。

entry.title: 远程媒体播放测试
entry.content: 视频播放安装视频播放插件dplayer，命令行运行：11 npm install hexo-tag-dplayer dplayer演示：1{% dplayer "url=视频地址" "pic=" "loop=no" "theme=#FADFA3" "autoplay=false" "token=tokendemo" %} (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer1"),"theme":"#FADFA3","video":{"url":"http://17431793.d.yyupload.com/down/17431793/MV/Kygo - This Town ft. Sasha Sloan - Music Video - Lyrics.mp4"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})() 音频播放安装音频播放插件aplayer,命令行运行：1npm install hexo-tag-aplayer aplayer演示1{% aplayer "歌曲名称" "作者" "音乐_url" "封面图片_url" "autoplay" %} var ap = new APlayer({ element: document.getElementById("aplayer-KqaqRMEv"), narrow: false, autoplay: true, showlrc: false, music: { title: "三十八度六DJ版", author: "黑龙", url: "http://www.ytmp3.cn/down/56345.mp3", pic: "http://img.ytmp3.cn/image/14.jpg", lrc: "" } }); window.aplayers || (window.aplayers = []); window.aplayers.push(ap); var ap = new APlayer({ element: document.getElementById("aplayer-XhoXWDxF"), narrow: false, autoplay: true, showlrc: false, music: { title: "梅花泪", author: "云菲菲", url: "http://www.ytmp3.cn/down/52259.mp3", pic: "http://img.ytmp3.cn/image/90.jpg", lrc: "" } }); window.aplayers || (window.aplayers = []); window.aplayers.push(ap);

entry.title: github+hexo简明安装教程
entry.content: 一、本地部署git https://git-scm.comnode.js https://nodejs.org/en/官方下载并一路默认安装打开CMD命令行 12345npm install -g hexo-clihexo init d:\blog\hexod:cd blog\hexohexo s # 命令详情参考官方文档：https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/commands.html 正常的话，此时已可以通过浏览器访问“localhost:4000”打开本地搭建的网页了（hexo s 这个窗口不能关闭） 小技巧： 1hexo g -w 1hexo s -s 同时运行这2条命令，可实现本地网站内容更改后的实时更新。 二、发布至Github 1、注册Github 2、相关配置 打开CMD命令行： 1231 git config --global user.name "Github用户名"2 git config --global user.email "Github注册邮箱"3 ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "Github注册邮箱" **打开”.ssh”目录下的“id_rsa.pub”,全选复制。 去Github网站添加密钥（粘贴刚才复制的内容）。** 更改网站配置文件的如下部分： 1231 deploy:2 type: git3 repo: 仓库地址.git CMD命令行进入本地网站主目录： 11 npm install hexo-deployer-git --save 3、上传网站 CMD进入本地网站主目录： 1231 hexo clean2 hexo g3 hexo d 至此一切顺利的话，访问Github域名即可看到生成的网站了。备注：由于我的安装路径有问题，故必须用node %appdata%\npm\node_modules\hexo-cli\bin\hexo 才能进行博客建立和部署。

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
